Text: Defeat Profane Fafnir!
His Eminence... Must protect...His Eminence...
The archbishop no longer rules Ishgard! The people shape our nation's future now!
My divine flames...shall consume you!
By the Fury, this is Ser Charibert's magick! Have care!
Your reckoning...is come!
Quickly, take one each!
●強力な攻撃が来ます！集まってください！
The time is come...to call upon the true power...of the Heavens' Ward...
This bodes ill... Quickly, take cover behind my shield!

●なんという攻撃だ……！
だがっ、ここで倒れるわけにはいかない……！
For the glory...of King Thordan!
His Eminence... You will return...His Eminence to me...
Stay on your guard!
Gather to me...ye faithful souls...
Render unto me...your strength!
These fiends empower the blasphemy! We must strike them down first!
Let us settle this...once and for all!
In the name of Ishgard, we will free you from your torment!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>─this way!
Defeat Charlet!
I'll draw his attention. <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, keep me in the fight!
I can't die until I lay Charlet to rest!
Lightning-aspected aether!? Keep away from it!
What's that lightning doing to me!? Cast Esuna, quickly!
Good work!
Hrrraaaghhh! T-Together... We must be...together!
Ungh! Can't move!
L-Like swatting...flies!
Not on my watch!
As long as I hold out, he won't lay a finger on you!
I-I can't do it! I'm too w-w-weak!
No you're not, Charlet! Your kindness is your strength!
I-I-I'm sorry, Fordola! Nnnhaaagh!
This is our chance. Let's finish him off!
It's over, Charlet. I'll end your suffering!
Th-This is all wrong! All wrong!
Let me handle this!
This ends now!
No... I can't let it end...like this...
Fordola! You can't die yet!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! No... Not like this!
10 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
5 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
4 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
3 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
2 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
1 second to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
Hold nothing back! Push yourself to your limit, and me to mine!
Hah! Still fight in you, I see.
Is this truly the best Hydaelyn's chosen can muster?
Soon you will know the full extent of my power.
Ah, my soul...how it burns!
I know you feel it, too. The inferno swelling within you.
Come! Let all creation be consumed by our ravenous fervor!
Do not tell me your life's fire is already spent...
Yes, yes! Rise once more! It mustn't end yet!
No, not yet! Not until the last of me is spent!
Burn, burn!
This is my moment! Our moment!
Did you not wish to take my head?
Have I overestimated your potential?
Have you no rage left for me? No rancor?
Show me your vaunted fortitude!
Protect Kan–E–Senna and defeat Gleipnir!
The Elder Seedseer must not be disturbed! Protect her!
He makes for the Elder Seedseer! To her side!
The ceremony is almost complete. Keep Gleipnir at bay!
Ugh... I can scarcely raise my spear... Has the poison taken effect already!?
He calls upon his wicked minions! Bring them to me─they will fall before my spear!
You must fend off his attacks if the Elder Seedseer is to survive!
So long as we are within the barrier, we need not fear Gleipnir's poison!
However, the battle is far from over. Steel yourselves!
The forest's blessing shall guide us through the most torrential storm!
More beasts! Protect the Elder Seedseer!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, to me! We must group together!
Even Gleipnir lashes out in the face of death. Bring an end to its misery while the barrier still stands!
Ea–Sura, I now fathom the depth of your suffering. For all that you held dear, I shall see to it that you are given peace.
His rancor makes even the elementals shudder in fear. The barrier may not last for much longer.
Press the attack!
There is hope yet! I shall erect the hedge once more!
The pain is too much to bear... I cannot...I cannot move...
That mist bears Gleipnir's poison! Do not allow them to drift near the Elder Seedseer!

毒気が浄化されただけでなく、力が溢れてくる！
これが精霊の力なのか！？！
The ceremony is almost complete! Bear Gleipnir's wrath for just a while longer!
I shall draw his ire. <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, lend the Elder Seedseer a portion of your power!
Come, you pitiful beast! Let us see the contents of your innards!
I swore that I would protect her. This time I shall not falter!
\\<cough> ...Ugh... \\<wheeze> My next charge shall be my last... <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, gift your aether unto the Elder Seedser!
Protect her... Ugh...
Gift your aether to Kan–E–Senna!
Defeat Gleipnir!
My aether is exhausted... I cannot stand...
Aim for the weak point of the aetherial orb!
Defeat the Indigo Beast!
Here it comes! We're counting on you, Lorens!
Aye, no enemy's weakness escapes my eyes...
Grrroooaaarrrggghhh!
See how easy that was? I reckon you can do it, too, Actin' Commander!
Is that all you've got? Time to put ye out of yer misery!
Grrroaaarghhh! My...my children...!
Wheiskaet, reporting for duty! Aye, now the real fun begins!
Now we're gettin' somewhere! Let's finish the deed!
Look alive, everyone! Victory is within our grasp!
●今すぐ俺の元に集まれッ！
The blasphemy's absorbin' their aether! I have a bad feelin' about this...
The tide turns against us...
Pshhh! We ssstand with you!
Pshhh! As do we! For the future of the Indigo Deep!
That's enough aether to go blastin' this entire island! We'd better work fast!
Where'd it go? Best be wary...
That trick o' yours won't work on us anymore. Ain't that right, Actin' Commander?
There is no end to them. Prepare yourselves!
Landenel! U'odh! Now's yer time to shine!
Wheiskaet! Defend us with yer blade!
Absorbin' their aether, is it? We'd best finish those beasts quickly...
The wall's gone! Aye, this is our chance to strike!
Ungh... Such power...
Here it comes again. Steel yerselves!
●皆、諦めるな！　活路はきっとある！
Noll...and the Crushing Tide! Let us stand as one, my friends!
If we don't take out those orbs, this'll be over before it starts. Ye ready!?
10 seconds to Extinction Flare...
5 seconds to Extinction Flare...
4 seconds to Extinction Flare...
3 seconds to Extinction Flare...
2 seconds to Extinction Flare...
1 second to Extinction Flare...
Protect the refugees!
Coordinate with G'raha Tia and defeat the beasts!
Coordinate with your comrades and defeat the beasts!
I'll command the beasts' attention. See to the wounded!

They're being overwhelmed by fear...
Alphinaud, do what you can!
●不要ラベル
Everyone's turning! All is lost!
Those who can stand, come with me!
...Worry not for the refugees, but for yourself, boy!

I don't like the look of that...
Stay sharp!
●不要ラベル
You take the lead, I'll provide support!
More beasts... I only hope my newfound abilities are enough!
You're starting to get the hang of those things.
They fight hard...but not hard enough!
We've lost too many already. G'raha, with me!
●不要になりました
Is there no way to break the chain of transformations!?
Watch out, Alisaie! This one is not like the rest!
See if I care! I won't back down!
●不要になりました
Now's our chance!
The air crackles with energy... Find cover!
As they say─turnabout's fair play!
Oho, a trio for the ages!
I had a feeling I'd find you here.<<key>>This should be the last of the worst troublemakers. With me!
●不要ラベル
Jullus will see the refugees to safety. We must keep the beasts at bay!
●不要ラベル
Heal the wounded refugees!
Calm the distressed refugees!
Infiltrate the supply depot
Set explosives on the magitek weaponry
Find a place to hide, then relay your progress
Access the control terminal
Withdraw from the supply depot
Assist A–Ruhn–Senna's troops
Assist Emmanellain's troops
Assist Sicard's troops
Head north and join the vanguard
Defeat the tempered imperials
Defeat Vergilia van Corculum
Two on the gate... Could get messy if I'm not careful.
One guarding the controls. Time he took a nap!
Now to set the explosives. Best keep quiet...for now.
So, they've got guard dogs, eh? No use hiding, they'll soon sniff me out. Luckily, I've come prepared.
●未使用ラベル
That should do the trick. Now to hide and send word.
This is Thancred. The explosives are in place.
Very good. All is proceeding as planned.<<key>>Head to the control terminal. It should be to the northwest.
●未使用ラベル
Understood. Have the others wait at the rendezvous point.
That's it! The control terminal!
Fighters─protect the others!
●未使用になりました
A brief respite─but stay alert.<<key>>Keep the carriages safe!
●未使用ラベル
What impeccable timing!<<key>>Fear not, friends─the savior of Ishgard is here!
●未使用ラベル
A fine display, but the other carriages are still in danger.<<key>>Go on ahead─we'll hold the line!
●未使用ラベル
We're the only ones still strugglin'?<<key>>Time we put our backs into it, then!
●未使用ラベル

That big bastard's goin' straight for the carriages!
Stop it in its tracks!
●未使用ラベル
Quick, broadside it!
●未使用ラベル
You lot all right back there?
We're fine─and ready for more!
Hear that?<<key>>Get to the front and turn the tide!
●未使用ラベル
We have them now─ Forward!
The supply caravan is safe for the time being, and Thancred's team have thrown the enemy into disarray.
●未使用ラベル
Now it's our turn!
●未使用ラベル
That's her─Vergilia!
●未使用ラベル
●未使用ラベル
Keep the war machines at bay!
Haha! More fodder for my flames!
So many... At this rate, we will be overwhelmed!
I will not fall so easily! These curs will taste my wrath!
More of them! Quick, lend Sadu a hand!
Make way! These whelps will rue the day they crossed my path!
None shall escape my chains! Now is your chance to strike!
Hahaha! May your screams fill the air!
●あの魔導リーパー……止めなきゃ危ない！
As a raging bull!
5 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
4 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
3 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
2 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
1 second until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
It's time. We only have one shot at this, so let's make it count!
If our assumption is correct, the fugitives have come─and may still be here. Keep your eyes peeled and your guard up.
These halls are home to dangerous creatures. I will draw their attention, that you may focus on applying your techniques.
To begin with, cast Kardia on me. The spell will establish a magical link between us.
The residual aether of your attacks will be channeled unto me, healing my wounds as you deal damage to our foes.
Sizable fiend ahead. I believe this calls for a barrier.
This time, augment your spells using Eukrasia, then cast Eukrasian Diagnosis on me.
This will bestow a barrier on me that provides both protection and healing.
More of the same plant taken... What could it possibly be?
Traces of ice... Someone recently fought here─a proficient wielder of magic.
The fugitives may be close. Be on your guard.
This will go poorly for you if you resist!
We'll see about that!
This is getting us nowhere! We must subdue Loifa first!
Oh, for the love of─ Have care, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Impressive! To see how well you wield your nouliths, one would not think you a novice!
Hm, nothing of note here... Let us head deeper into the arboretum.
Let's finish them quickly!
Ancel, that's enough! You mustn't lose your temper!
We'll deal with you instead!
That's enough, Mahaud!
Loifa, no!
No... Not here...
Hmph! There'll be nothing left of you but ash!
I've got this. Stand back.
Search for the fugitives.
Cast Kardia on Lalah.
Cast Eukrasian Diagnosis on Lalah.
Eliminate the wildlife.
Eliminate the wildlife.
Search the area for clues.
Defeat Loifa and his accomplices!
Yes, just so! Let us continue on!
Excellent! Now we may proceed with confidence!
It's over! Lay down your arms, and I promise you won't come to further harm!
Godsdammit... If it wasn't for that sage...
Ungh... Well, well...
So, shall we practice some somanoutical fundamentals?
Some manner of plant seems to have been harvested here. I can't identify it by the remaining parts, however...
There may be other clues nearby. We should investigate further.
Th-Their enhancement has given them such power!?
ロイファを狙いましょう！
Mahaud, return the favor and take care of that sage! Finish it!
Grrr, damn you!
Defeat the chimera.
Speak with Drusilla.
Gibbet will hurt 'em from the flank, and Gallows will surprise 'em from behind. If you're getting' swarmed, use Guillotine to carve yourself some space.
The chimera won't be able to resist the smell of blood─make sure to soak these sands in it!
You're getting' the hang of it! Gibbet will hurt 'em from the side─switch off between that and Gallows to make your attacks even more deadly!
That's what I like to see! Gallows will hurt 'em from behind─switch off between that and Gibbet to make your attacks even more deadly!
You're usin' Guillotine like a true killer! Reap a feast of souls in one fell swoop!
You've takin' to killin' more quickly than I could've hoped. It'll be an easy thing to summon your avatar to your side.
Let's move on to the fun bit, eh? Your avatar will help you strike fear into the hearts of your foes.
Now call it to your side! Blood stalk and grim swathe will make short work of these fiends!
The bloodshed should've gotten the chimera's attention. Steel yourself for a fight!
Our target arrives. Finish this and I'll let you keep its head as a trophy!
So long as your avatar is by your side, monsters like this are nothin' more than easy prey.
Show me you've been listenin', <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Give your avatar a feast to remember!
Remember to position yourself! Gibbet from the side, Gallows from the rear! Simple enough, eh?
Fill your Soul Gauge and summon your avatar!
Defeat the mired chimera!
Harvest the souls of the fallen to summon your avatar!
Use Gibbet
Use Gallows
Use Guillotine
Hehehe! I have awaited this feast for far too long. I think I shall skip straight to the main course!
The pig squirms and writhes. Stay still and let the chef's blade finish the job!
Hmph. Very well. Meat is all the more delicious when it is tenderized!
Give him a taste of his own vile medicine, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. Rip his soul out!
You just worry about Orcus, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. I'll take care of the rest.
Gah... No...
Defeat Orcus!
Ugh... I can't die...without a final meal.
Lightning gathers! We must head it off!
To attack with such reckless abandon... Their bodies and minds must be on the verge of breaking!
Sharlayan will suffer your villainy no more!
Damn it, they're not in their right minds!
You'll pay for all the lives you've destroyed!
Spread out, spread out!
Stay with me, my friends! We'll free you yet!
Wake up, Ancel! Please!
Steady, Mahaud! Steady!
みんな、当たらないように散るんだ！
Ancel! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)> needs our help!
Aaahhh! Arrrggghhh!
Unnnghhh... Arrrggghhh!
Heh heh heh... Let us begin with you, Ancel!
That will do, that will do... Mahaud─your turn!
Man's frail flesh is his greatest flaw! If we are to evolve, we must break free of its confines!
Hm, so this is your limit. \\<sigh> Yet another disappointment...but perhaps you can take one of these meddlers with you to the grave!
Ahahahahahaha!
You truly are fascinating specimens! Oh, the things I will learn from your cadavers!
This proving ground was prepared especially for you. I trust you won't mind if I harvest a sample or two!
Come, let us test the edge of my scalpel!
I am quite experienced in the art of amputation. You won't feel a thing!
Subdue Ancel and Mahaud.
Defeat Guildivain!
You're disgusting!
This bodes ill... We must finish him quickly!
Then we have no choice but to subdue them.
People are not your playthings, you fiend!
Hmph, laugh while you can! You won't be doing it much longer!
It has been a tremendous pleasure, my dear subjects. But all good things must come to an end.
Oh gods, not this spell!
Damn it, he's taken control of their minds again!
Oho, it seems our two sages have protection─intrinsic and extrinsic, respectively. Curiouser and curiouser...
Not good... At this rate, their minds will be irreparably damaged!
This magick is derived from somanoutics! If we destroy his nouliths, we can break its hold!
Too clever by half! But you'll need to be quick too, else your comrades' brains will melt in their skulls.
Yes, we did it! Are you all right, my friends!?
\\<pant> \\<pant> I think so... Thank you...

Your successor is proving <If(PlayerParameter(4))>herself<Else/>himself</If> quite the nuisance, Hatia... But unique as <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> is, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> is most definitely worth the trouble!
Keep your comrades alive and break their mind control.
Defeat Erichthonios
I must save them... But first...
You will go no further...
I'll shatter you against the stones!
Be assailed by ice and flame!
Your bones to ash! Your flesh to ice!
You leave me no choice...
I cannot allow you to run free!
Chains to bind you!
No... The lives of my colleagues are at stake!
Should it cost me my life, I will triumph!
I must... I must return you to your cell!
These shackles cannot be sundered!
Cast off my chains, and I shall bind you again! Ever tighter...
This shall be your final resting place!
Be imprisoned 'twixt light and flame!
Run all you like, but my chains will catch you!
Drag them unto the depths, O chains!
I will lock you away, once and again! Forever!
Defeat the phoinix

理由はわからないが、獄卒長が環境を作り変えたみたいだ……！
ともかく今は眼前の脅威を、フェネクスを弱らせてくれ！
Minato holds me responsible for Kisei's death. I will keep its attention.
Have care. The air is thick with her malice.
It means to charge! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, can you break its focus?
Well struck.
Remain calm and alert. It may attempt another charge.
A formidable foe indeed. But we will not be bested!
It readies to strike! On your guard!
I...I can't move...
We must discuss your change of vocation─after dealing with the blasphemy.
Quickly! We must protect Gosetsu!
You have my thanks.
Urgh... This is nothing.
It comes for me! Perhaps a grazing shot will break its concentration.
